name: Idaten Jump
description: Idaten Jump is a Japanese manga series created by Toshihiro Fujiwara. It was serialized in Kodansha's Comic BomBom. The manga tells the story about a boy named Sho Yamato who loves mountain biking. It was adapted into a 52-episode anime series, produced by Aniplex, Production I.G. and Trans Arts. It aired from October 1, 2005 to September 30, 2006. A toyline was also made by Tomy.
